data.text:
Standout Features

Fantastic Investment opportunity

First time buyers home

Two Bedroom Mid Terrace

Close to City Centre

Close to local amenities

Modern Kitchen

Modern Bathroom

Ready to move in

Available Chain Free

Property Description

Available Chain Free: This is a fantastic investment or first time buyers home. Briefly comprising of a front facing living room, Kitchen and bathroom on the ground floor. There are two bedrooms on the first floor. To the front of the property is a small garden, to the rear is a courtyard garden. The property is close to local amenities and within walking distance to Doncaster City Centre. Call now to arrange a viewing

LIVING ROOM 15' 5" x 11' 2" (4.72m x 3.42m) A front facing living room with bay window and feature fireplace.

KITCHEN 8' 9" x 7' 10" (2.69m x 2.41m) With a range of light wood wall and base units complemented with grey worktops. Integrated oven and electric hob and plumbing for a washing machine.

BATHROOM 9' 8" x 5' 9" (2.95m x 1.77m) A stunning contemporary bathroom with white three piece suite and over bath shower.

BEDROOM 11' 8" x 11' 1" (3.58m x 3.40m) Double bedroom

BEDROOM 8' 10" x 11' 1" (2.71m x 3.40m) Second bedroom

Material Information

Tenure: Freehold
